title: Dimo's Pizza - Wicker Park
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Pizza, Fast food, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves both vegan pizza by the slice and whole vegan pizzas daily with a unique variety of toppings. Serves beer and speciality sodas. Free Wi-Fi. Previously known as Ian's Pizza. Has one other location in Chicago as of 12/13.
